title: Power cuts to continue
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission has approved further power for today.

Areas listed under groups P, Q, R, S, T, U, V, and W will experience two-hour power cuts between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. These areas will again experience power outages of one hour between 5 p.m. and 9 p.m.

Power supply for the areas mentioned under groups A, B, C, D, E, F, G, and H will be interrupted for a period of two hours and 30 minutes between 8 a.m. and 6 p.m. and a further disruption of one and hour 15 minutes between 6 p.m. and 11 p.m.
